PatricKnowlan

Technology Consultant, Web Developer, Grad Student

Trying my best to figure things out one day at a time.

So you want to know little more about me.
Ok, here are things I like.

Hiking, Movies, Learning, Sandwiches, Boating, Android, Fishing, Roadtrips, Cooking, Fitness, Camping, Industrial Settings, Adventures, Grey, Biking, Craft Beer, Coffee, People, National Parks, New Technology

Work

I work for a small tech startup called 540 where I help the government use cutting edge technology. We specialize in building APIs and Apps.

Play

I like to be outdoors in my spare time. On my boat in the summer and skiing in the winter. I keep myself busy with fun adventures and activities.

Learn

I studied Integrated Science & Technology at JMU for my Bachelors and am currently persuing a Cyber Security Masters at GWU.

Dream

I want to make a difference. I will accomplish that by building a revolutionary product. What the product is.... I just haven't thought of it yet!.

Create

I like to build things. Here are a couple projects I am currently working on. My main interestes in tech are home automation, mobile devices, internet of things, and security. I would love to build APIs for household appliances.

JMU.io

James Madison University campus information available via public APIs so that students, faculty, really anyone can easily develop university related apps without having to worry about maintaing the data.

Road Trip 2012

This was one of the greatest adventures of my life. Along the way I built a quick website to document my travels. Only regret was that I didn't take enough pictures along the way! Hope I can do it again some day.
